item.title: Wait Times at Walt Disney World
item.description: The data used for this analysis was originally published by Touring Plans. I used the data for six rides: two from the Magic Kingdom (Seven Dwarfs Mine Train & Splash Mountain), two from Hollywood Studios (Toy Story Mania & The Rockin Rollercoaster), and two from Epcot (Soarin & Spaceship Earth). library(tidyverse) library(lubridate) library(corrplot) library(caret) library(skimr) library(ModelMetrics) library(janitor) library(broom) library(forcats) There was a separate csv file for each ride. I originally merged & cleaned this data using Python.
